alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hodgeman; Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 12:27AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ford, central Finney, southeastern Ness, Hodgeman, Gray and eastern Haskell Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Beeler to 7 miles west of Kalvesta to 6 miles south of Holcomb. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kalvesta around 1230 AM CDT. Plymell around 1235 AM CDT. Ingalls around 1240 AM CDT. Cimarron around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Howell, Sublette, Ensign, Tice, The Haggard Elev, Dodge City, Wright and Ft. Dodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
